p: Variations in the chemical composition of EOs depend on many factors such as the quality of the plant material, the part of the plant used for extraction, the characteristics of the climate and soil, the harvest time, as well as methods and times extraction used for the production and analysis [ 39, 43, 44, 45, 46, 47]. Depending on the distillation time and method, the chemical profile of HYs can also vary [ 48].
